subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Monterosso won the $10 million Dubai World Cup on Saturday, the world’s richest horse race, in a victory for the ruler of Dubai after one of his horses was injured in another race.
snippet: Monterosso won the $10 million Dubai World Cup on Saturday, the world’s richest horse race, in a victory for the ruler of Dubai after one of his horses was injured in another race.
